description.english: Survive the babies (beat all the levels in the Nursery)
description.spanish: Sobrevive a los niños (supera la Guardería)
description.brazilian: Sobreviva à cambada de bebês (supere o Berçário)
description.italian: Sopravvivi ai bambini (supera l’Asilo Nido)
description.french: Survis aux enfants (termine le niveau Crèche)
description.german: Überlebe die Kinder (schließe den Kindergarten ab)
description.schinese: 应对好小宝宝（完成儿童乐园的所有关卡）
description.japanese: 子どもたちから生き延びる（子ども部屋をクリア）

description.english: Breathe the love in the air (beat all the levels in the Suites)
description.spanish: Respira el amor en el aire (supera las Suites)
description.brazilian: O amor está no ar (supere as Suítes)
description.italian: Respira l’amore nell’aria (supera le Suite)
description.french: Respire l’amour dans l'air (termine le niveau Suites)
description.german: Atme die Liebe in der Luft ein (schließe die Suiten ab)
description.russian: Ощути аромат любви (пройди все уровни VIP-номеров)
description.schinese: 呼吸空气中的爱意（完成情侣套房的所有关卡）
description.japanese: 恋の予感（スイートルームをクリア）

displayName.german: Morgen beginne ich mit der Diät ...
displayName.japanese: ダイエットは明日から…

description.english: But first, a cupcake (beat all the levels in  the Bakery)
description.spanish: Pero primero, un bollito (supera la Confitería)
description.brazilian: Só mais um cupcake, eu juro (supere a Confeitaria)
description.italian: Ma prima, un dolcetto (supera la Pasticceria)
description.french: Mais d’abord, un gâteau (termine le niveau Boulangerie)
description.german: Aber zuerst ein Brötchen (schließe die Konditorei ab)
description.russian: Но сперва кексик (пройди все уровни пекарни)
description.schinese: 但先吃个蛋糕增加动力吧（完成面包房的所有关卡）
description.japanese: その前にあと一口（お菓子屋をクリア）

description.english: Pay your respects in the Temple (beat all the levels in  the Temple)
description.spanish: Presenta tus respetos en el Templo (supera el Templo)
description.brazilian: Preste seus respeitos (supere o Templo)
description.italian: Rendi omaggio al Tempio (supera il Tempio)
description.french: Fais une offrande au Temple (termine le niveau Temple)
description.german: Erweise dem Tempel deinen Respekt (schließe den Tempel ab)
description.russian: Помолись в храме (пройди все уровни храма)
description.schinese: 去教堂参拜（完成寺教堂的所有关卡）
description.japanese: 神殿に敬意を（神殿をクリア）

description.english: I wouldn't drink that water... (beat all the levels in the Spa)
description.spanish: Yo no bebería de ese agua... (supera el Balneario)
description.brazilian: Dessa água eu não bebo (supere o Spa)
description.italian: Io non berrei quell’acqua... (supera la Spa)
description.french: Ne dis jamais, fontaine... (termine le niveau Spa)
description.german: Ich würde dieses Wasser nicht trinken ... (schließe das Heilbad ab)
description.russian: Я б такую воду пить не стал... (пройди все уровни спа)
description.schinese: 我可不想喝那儿的水…（完成SPA的所有关卡）
description.japanese: その水は飲まないほうが... (スパをクリア）

description.english: Why is there dynamite in this hotel? (beat all the levels in the Castle)
description.spanish: ¿Por qué tenemos dinamita en el hotel...? (supera el Castillo Tenebroso)
description.brazilian: Por que tem dinamite no hotel? (supere o Castelo Tenebroso)
description.italian: Perché abbiamo della dinamite nell’hotel...? (supera il Castello Tenebroso)
description.french: Pourquoi y a-t-il de la dynamite dans l’hôtel ? (termine le niveau Château Ténébreux)
description.german: Warum haben wir Dynamit im Hotel ...? (schließe die dunkle Schloss ab)
description.russian: Откуда в этом отеле динамит? (пройди все уровни замка)
description.schinese: 酒店里怎么有炸药？（完成城堡的所有关卡）
description.japanese: なぜホテルにダイナマイトが...？（不気味な城をクリア）

displayName.german: Ich bin schon Feuer und Flamme
displayName.japanese: 道を空けてくれ、燃えてるんだ

description.english: Professional fire extinguisher (beat all the levels in the Volcano)
description.spanish: Apagador de fuegos profesional (supera el Volcán)
description.brazilian: Apaga-fogo profissional (supere o Vulcão)
description.italian: Estintore professionale (supera il Vulcano)
description.french: Pompier professionnel (termine le niveau Volcan)
description.german: Professioneller Feuerlöscher (schließe den Vulkan ab)
description.schinese: 专业灭火队员（完成火山的所有关卡）
description.japanese: プロの消火隊（火山をクリア）

description.english: Guide the penguins  (beat all the levels in the Gallery)
description.spanish: Guía a los pingüinos (supera la Galería)
description.brazilian: Guie os pinguins (supere a Galeria)
description.italian: Guida i pinguini (supera la Galleria)
description.french: Guide les pingouins (termine le niveau Galerie)
description.german: Führe die Pinguine herum (schließe die Galerie ab)
description.russian: Стань гидом пингвинов (пройди все уровни галереи)
description.schinese: 给企鹅们带路（完成画廊的所有关卡）
description.japanese: ペンギンを誘導する（ギャラリーをクリア）

description.english: Break Beatriz's heart (beat Beatriz)
description.spanish: Rómpele el corazón a Beatriz (derrota a Beatriz)
description.brazilian: Rompa o coração da Beatriz (derrote a Beatriz)
description.italian: Spezza il cuore di Beatriz (sconfiggi Beatriz)
description.french: Brise le cœur de Beatriz (vainc Beatriz)
description.german: Brich Beatriz das Herz (besiege Beatriz)
description.schinese: 打碎比阿特丽斯 (Beatriz) 的心（击败比阿特丽斯 (Beatriz)）
description.japanese: ベアトリスの心を壊す（ベアトリスをクリア）

description.english: Get all the keys of the Nursery
description.spanish: Consigue todas las llaves de la Guardería
description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as chaves do Berçário
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le chiavi dell’Asilo Nido
description.french: Obtiens toutes les clés de la Crèche
description.german: Finde alle Schlüssel für den Kindergarten
description.schinese: 获得儿童乐园的所有钥匙
description.japanese: 子ども部屋の鍵をすべて入手する

description.japanese: スイートルームの鍵をすべて入手する

description.spanish: Consigue todas las llaves de la Confitería

description.schinese: 获得面包房的所有钥匙
description.japanese: お菓子屋の鍵をすべて入手する

displayName.brazilian: Nem tudo que reluz é ouro

description.japanese: 神殿の鍵をすべて入手する

displayName.japanese: ここで働かせてください！

description.english: Get all the keys of the Spa
description.spanish: Consigue todas las llaves del Balneario

description.french: Obtiens toutes les clés du Spa

description.spanish: Consigue todas las llaves de la Galería

description.italian: Ottieni tutte le chiavi della Galleria

description.english: Beat Beatriz with all the keys
description.spanish: Consigue todas las llaves del Ático

description.french: Obtiens toutes les clés du dernier étage

description.schinese: 用所有钥匙打败比阿特丽斯 (Beatriz)

description.english: Leave the entire hotel 100% clean
description.spanish: Deja todo el hotel Empyreum impoluto
description.brazilian: Deixe o hotel tinindo
description.italian: Lascia l’intero hotel Empyreum immacolato
description.french: Rends tout l’hôtel Empyreum impeccable
description.german: Mach das gesamte Empyreum-Hotel blitzblank sauber
description.schinese: 将整座酒店 100% 打扫干净
description.japanese: エンピリアム・ホテル全体をピカピカにする

displayName.japanese: エンピリアムへようこそ

description.english: Sign the contracts at the beginning of the game
description.spanish: Comienza a trabajar formalmente en el hotel
description.brazilian: Comece a trabalhar oficialmente no hotel
description.italian: Inizia a lavorare formalmente in hotel
description.french: Commence à travailler officiellement dans l’hôtel
description.german: Beginne offiziell deine Arbeit im Hotel
description.schinese: 在游戏开头时签署合同
description.japanese: ホテルで正式に働きはじめる

description.english: Knowledge is power (find one secret fruit)
description.spanish: El saber es poder (consigue una fruta secreta)
description.brazilian: Saber é poder (encontre uma fruta secreta)
description.italian: La conoscenza è potere (ottieni un frutto segreto)
description.french: Savoir, c'est pouvoir (obtiens un fruit secret)
description.german: Wissen ist Macht (finde eine geheime Frucht)
description.schinese: 知识就是力量（找到一个秘密果实）
description.japanese: 知識は力なり（シークレット・フルーツを1つ入手）

description.english: Knowledge brings you closer to the truth (find two secret fruits)
description.spanish: El conocimiento te acerca a la verdad (consigue dos frutas secretas)
description.brazilian: O conhecimento te aproxima da verdade (encontre duas frutas secretas)
description.italian: La conoscenza ti avvicina alla verità (ottieni due frutti segreti)
description.french: La connaissance mène à la vérité (obtiens deux fruits secrets)
description.german: Wissen bringt dich der Wahrheit näher (finde zwei geheime Früchte)
description.russian: Знание помогает узнать истину (найди 2 секретных фрукта)
description.schinese: 知识让你更接近真相（找到两个秘密果实）
description.japanese: 知識を得て真実に近づく（シークレット・フルーツをを2つ入手）

description.english: Find the truth (find three secret fruits)
description.spanish: La verdad (consigue las tres frutas secretas)
description.brazilian: A verdade nua e crua (encontre três frutas secretas)
description.italian: La verità (ottieni i tre frutti segreti)
description.french: La vérité (obtiens les trois fruits secrets)
description.german: Die Wahrheit (finde die drei geheimen Früchte)
description.schinese: 找出真相（找到三个秘密果实）
description.japanese: 真実（シークレット・フルーツを3つ入手）

displayName.schinese: 比阿特丽斯 (Beatriz) 的秘密

description.english: Uncover the forgotten secrets of the Hotel
description.spanish: Descubre los recuerdos perdidos del hotel
description.brazilian: Descubra as memórias perdidas do hotel
description.italian: Scopri i ricordi perduti dell’hotel
description.french: Découvre les souvenirs perdus de l’hôtel
description.german: Entdecke die verlorenen Erinnerungen des Hotels
description.schinese: 发现酒店久已遗忘的秘密
description.japanese: ホテルの失われた記憶を発見する

description.english: Dress Tommy as a superspy and play with him in the Gallery
description.spanish: Viste a Tommy como un superespía y juega con él en la Galería.
description.brazilian: Vista o Tommy como um superespião e jogue com ele na Galeria
description.italian: Vesti Tommy da super spia e gioca con lui nella Galleria.
description.french: Habille Tommy en super-espion et joue avec lui dans la Galerie
description.german: Verkleide Tommy als Superspion und spiele mit ihm in der Galerie.
description.russian: Одень Томми в костюм суперагента и поиграй с ним в галерее
description.schinese: 将汤米 (Tommy) 打扮成超级间谍，和他在画廊里一起玩耍
description.japanese: トミーにスーパースパイの格好をさせて、ギャラリーで一緒に遊ぶ

description.english: Escape from Beatriz's office
description.spanish: Escapa del despacho de Beatriz
description.brazilian: Fuja da sala da Beatriz
description.italian: Scappa dall’ufficio di Beatriz
description.french: Échappe-toi du bureau de Beatriz
description.german: Fliehe aus Beatriz' Büro
description.schinese: 从比阿特丽斯 (Beatriz) 的办公室逃离
description.japanese: ベアトリスのオフィスから脱出

description.english: See you downstairs (fall to the void in the Temple while turned into gold)
description.german: Wir sehen uns unten (falle in die Leere, nachdem du zu Gold geworden bist)
description.french: On se retrouve en bas (tombe dans le vide après avoir été transformé en or).
description.italian: Ci vediamo sotto (cadi nel vuoto dopo la trasformazione in oro)
description.spanish: Nos vemos abajo (cae al vacío tras convertirte en oro)
description.schinese: 楼下见（在变成黄金时落入教堂中的虚空之中）
description.russian: Увидимся внизу (провались в бездну, превратившись в золото в храме)
description.brazilian: Descida forçada (caia no vazio enquanto vira ouro)
description.japanese: 下で会おう（黄金に姿を変えた後、飛び降りる）

description.english: Attend Apolo's concert
description.spanish: Asiste al concierto del nuevo grupo de Apolo
description.brazilian: Assista ao show do novo grupo do Apolo
description.italian: Partecipa al concerto del nuovo gruppo di Apolo
description.french: Assiste au concert du nouveau groupe d’Apolo
description.german: Besuche das Konzert von Apollos neuer Band
description.schinese: 出席阿波罗 (Apolo) 的音乐会
description.japanese: アポロの新しいバンドのコンサートに参加する

description.english: Vacuum 1000 specks of dust
description.german: Wohin verschwindet wohl der ganze Schmutz aus dem Staubsauger? (sauge 1000 Staubkörner auf)
description.french: Où va donc toute la saleté de l'aspirateur ? (Aspire 1000 grains de poussière)
description.italian: Dove andrà a finire tutta la sporcizia dell’aspirapolvere? (Aspira 1.000 granelli di polvere)
description.spanish: ¿A dónde irá toda la suciedad de la aspiradora? (Aspira 1000 motas de polvo)
description.schinese: 用吸尘器清理 1000 颗灰尘
description.japanese: 掃除機のゴミは、いったいどこに溜まってるんだろう？（1000個のホコリを掃除機で吸い取る）
description.brazilian: Pra onde foi toda a sujeira? (aspire 1.000 partículas de poeira)

displayName.german: Ja nicht den gewischten Boden betreten!
displayName.french: Ne marche pas sur le mouillé !
displayName.japanese: 拭いたばかりの所を踏まないで！

description.english: Clean 1000 puddles
description.german: Vorsicht, nasser Boden (wische 1000 Pfützen auf)
description.french: Attention, c’est mouillé ! (nettoie 1000 flaques)
description.italian: Fai attenzione, pavimento bagnato (pulisci 1.000 pozzanghere)
description.spanish: Cuidado, suelo mojado (friega 1000 charcos)
description.schinese: 清理 1000 个水坑
description.brazilian: O chão está brilhando (esfregue 1.000 poças d'água)
description.japanese: 清掃中、足元に注意（1000個の水たまりを拭く）

description.english: They smell fresh (make 50 beds)
description.german: Die riechen schön sauber (wechsle 50 Bettlaken)
description.french: Ça sent bon (change 50 draps)
description.italian: Hanno un odore di pulito (cambia 50 lenzuola)
description.spanish: Huelen a limpio (cambia 50 sábanas)
description.schinese: 它们闻起来好清新（铺 50 张床）
description.brazilian: É só deitar e dormir... (faça 50 camas)
description.japanese: 清潔な香りがする（50枚のシーツを取り替える）

description.english: Did you have enough?! (slap another player 333 times in total)
description.german: Hast du jetzt genug? (Verteile 333 Ohrfeigen)
description.french: Tu en as assez ? (donne 333 gifles)
description.italian: Ne hai avuto abbastanza!? (Dai 333 schiaffi)
description.spanish: ¿¡Has tenido ya suficiente!? (Da 333 bofetadas)
description.schinese: 你受够了吗？！（总共扇另一玩家 333 次耳光）
description.russian: С тебя хватит? (шлёпни другого игрока 333 раза)
description.brazilian: Tá bom ou quer mais? (dê 333 bofetadas na galera)
description.japanese: もう十分だろ！？ (333ビンタする)

description.english: Do nothing but moving the pallet in a level of the Bakery
description.german: Alles für das Team (bewege ausschließlich die Palette auf einer Ebene in der Konditorei)
description.french: Sacrifice pour l’équipe (consacre-toi au déplacement de la palette dans un niveau de la Boulangerie)
description.italian: Tutto per la squadra (dedicati esclusivamente a spostare il pallet su un piano della Pasticceria)
description.spanish: Todo sea por el equipo (dedícate exclusivamente a mover el palé en un nivel en la Confitería)
description.schinese: 其他什么都不做，只搬动面包房楼层的托盘
description.russian: Передвинь поддон на уровне пекарни. И всё.
description.brazilian: Tudo pelo bem da equipe (dedique-se exclusivamente a mover o palete em um nível da Confeitaria)
description.japanese: すべてはチームのために (お菓子屋のパレットを移動することに専念する)

displayName.japanese: ネコを撫でてもいいよ

description.english: It's so fluffy I'm gonna die! (pet the cat in the Reception)
description.german: Sie ist so weich, dass ich sterben möchte (streichle die Katze an der Rezeption)
description.french: Il est tel-le-ment doux (caresse le chat de la réception)
description.italian: Sembra morbido da morire (accarezza il gatto della reception)
description.spanish: Es tan suave que me quiero morir (acaricia al gato de la recepción)
description.schinese: 毛绒绒的，爱死了！（在酒店大堂拍拍猫咪）
description.russian: Он такой пушистый! Умереть не встать! (погладь кота в холле)
description.brazilian: Eu posso fazer isso o dia todo (acaricie o gato da recepção)
description.japanese: なんてふわふわなんだ（レセプションのネコをなでる）

displayName.japanese: カオス・エージェント

description.english: Fill the world with jelly (get 15 jellys from the same dispenser in the Bakery)
description.german: Fülle alles mit Gelee (nimm 15 Gelees aus dem gleichen Spender)
description.french: Remplis le monde de gélatine (sors 15 gélatines du même distributeur)
description.italian: Riempi il mondo di gelatina (prendi 15 gelatine dallo stesso dispenser)
description.spanish: Llena el mundo de gelatina (saca 15 gelatinas del mismo dispensador)
description.schinese: 让世界充满果酱（在面包房的同一个果酱机上接 15 份果酱）
description.russian: Пора утопить мир в желе (собери 15 порций желе из 1 крана в пекарне)
description.brazilian: Encha o mundo de gelatina (tire 15 gelatinas do mesmo dispensador)
description.japanese: 世界をゼリーでいっぱいにする（同じディスペンサーから15個のゼリーを作る）

description.english: Now the Reception is complete (get all the gifts from the guests)
description.german: Jetzt ist die Rezeption komplett (hole dir alle Geschenke von den Gästen an der Rezeption)
description.french: La réception est désormais complète (obtiens tous les cadeaux des clients de la réception)
description.italian: Ora la Reception è completa (ricevi tutti i regali dagli ospiti della Reception)
description.spanish: Ahora la Recepción está completa (consigue todos los regalos de los huéspedes de la recepción)
description.schinese: 完成酒店大堂任务（获得所有的客人礼物）
description.russian: Приём окончен (получи все подарки от гостей)
description.brazilian: Agora sim a recepção está completa (consiga todos os presentes dos hóspedes da recepção)
description.japanese: レセプションは満席だ（レセプションのゲストからのプレゼントをすべて入手）
